statements.name: AccountDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX AccountDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex ON Account(deviceIdKey, deviceKey)

statements.name: AccountLogAccountKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX AccountLogAccountKeyIndex ON AccountLog(accountKey)

statements.name: AccountLogTimeStampIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX AccountLogTimeStampIndex ON AccountLog(timeStamp)

statements.name: AccountTransTransDateIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX AccountTransTransDateIndex ON AccountTrans(transDate)

statements.name: AccountTransTransKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX AccountTransTransKeyIndex ON AccountTrans(transType, transKey)

statements.name: BillDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX BillDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex ON Bill(deviceIdKey, deviceKey)

statements.name: BillsDueDateIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX BillsDueDateIndex ON Bill(dueDate)

statements.name: BudgetCatKeySubCatKeyMonthYearIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX BudgetCatKeySubCatKeyMonthYearIndex ON Budget(catKey, subCatKey, month, year)

statements.name: BudgetFutureSubCatStartDateEndDateIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX BudgetFutureSubCatStartDateEndDateIndex ON BudgetFuture(subCatKey, startDate, endDate)

statements.name: DeviceInfoDeviceIdIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX DeviceInfoDeviceIdIndex ON DeviceInfo(deviceId)

statements.name: ExpenseDateIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX ExpenseDateIndex ON Expense(date)

statements.name: ExpenseDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX ExpenseDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex ON Expense(deviceIdKey, deviceKey)

statements.name: FIHintsNameIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX FIHintsNameIndex ON FIHints(accountKey, name, trnType)

statements.name: FITransFiTIDIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX FITransFiTIDIndex ON FITrans(accountKey, fiTID)

statements.name: IncomeDate
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX IncomeDate ON Income(date)

statements.name: IncomeDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX IncomeDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex ON Income(deviceIdKey, deviceKey)

statements.name: PayeeDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex
statements.sql: CREATE INDEX PayeeDeviceIdDeviceKeyIndex ON Payee(deviceIdKey, deviceKey)

statements.name: Account
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Account (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, icon TEXT, accountType TEXT, balance REAL DEFAULT 0.00, deleteOK CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, balanceDate DATE, includeAccount CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', seqNum INTEGER DEFAULT 0, currency TEXT)

statements.name: AccountLog
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE AccountLog(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, accountKey INTEGER, timeStamp DATETIME, transType INTEGER, transKey INTEGER, transAmount REAL, newBalance REAL, checked CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', transDate DATE)

statements.name: AccountTrans
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE AccountTrans(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, accountKey INTEGER, timeStamp DATETIME, transType INTEGER, transKey INTEGER, transDate DATE, transAmount REAL, checked CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N')

statements.name: Bill
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Bill (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, payeeKey INTEGER, amount REAL, dueDate  DATE, paid CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', expenseKey INTEGER, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, timeStamp DATETIME, billType INTEGER DEFAULT 0, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, recurringKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, catKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, subCatKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, fromAccountKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, notes TEXT)

statements.name: Budget
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Budget(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, month INTEGER, year INTEGER, amount TEXT)

statements.name: BudgetFuture
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE BudgetFuture(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, cycle INTEGER, startDate DATE, endDate DATE, amount TEXT)

statements.name: BudgetHistory
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE BudgetHistory(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, budgetType CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'E', catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, startDate DATE, endDate DATE, amount TEXT, rolloverBalance TEXT, rolloverOnOff CHAR(1))

statements.name: BudgetSettings
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE BudgetSettings(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, budgetType CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'E', catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, cycle INTEGER, startDate DATE, endDate DATE, amount TEXT, rolloverOnOff CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', rolloverBalance TEXT, modulus INTEGER, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER)

statements.name: Category
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Category (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, icon TEXT, deleteOK CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', seqNum INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER)

statements.name: Currency
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Currency (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, code TEXT, locale TEXT, exchangeRate TEXT)

statements.name: DeviceInfo
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE DeviceInfo(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, deviceId TEXT, deviceName TEXT, isActive CHAR(1), isPrimary CHAR(1))

statements.name: Expense
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Expense (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, amount REAL, periods INTEGER, notes TEXT, isDetailEntry CHAR(1), masterKey INTEGER, includesReceipt CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', payFrom INTEGER DEFAULT 0, payeeKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, billKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, timeStamp DATETIME, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, recurringKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, isCategorySplit CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N')

statements.name: FIHints
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE FIHints (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, accountKey INTEGER, name TEXT, trnType INTEGER, processAs INTEGER, catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, payeeKey INTEGER, account2Key INTEGER)

statements.name: FITrans
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE FITrans (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, accountKey INTEGER, fiTID TEXT, trnType TEXT, datePosted TEXT, trnAmount TEXT, sic TEXT, name TEXT, processState CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'U', processAs INTEGER, catKey INTEGER, subCatKey INTEGER, payeeKey INTEGER, account2Key INTEGER)

statements.name: Income
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Income(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, name TEXT, amount REAL DEFAULT 0.00, notes TEXT, masterKey INTEGER, addIncomeTo INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, timeStamp DATETIME, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, recurringKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0)

statements.name: Payee
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Payee (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, accountNum TEXT, phoneNum TEXT, webURL TEXT, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, notes TEXT)

statements.name: RecurringBill
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE RecurringBill (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, billType INTEGER DEFAULT 0, payeeOrAccountKey INTEGER, amount TEXT, nextGenDate  DATE, recurringIndex INTEGER, modulus INTEGER, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, endDate DATE, generateNow CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', catKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, subCatKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, fromAccountKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, notes TEXT)

statements.name: RecurringExpense
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE RecurringExpense (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, subCatKey INTEGER, catKey INTEGER, amount TEXT, timesAYear INTEGER, nextGenDate DATE, modulus INTEGER, payFrom INTEGER, payee INTEGER, notes TEXT, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, endDate DATE, generateNow CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N')

statements.name: RecurringIncome
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE RecurringIncome(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, amount REAL DEFAULT 0.00, startDate DATE, timesAYear INTEGER, notes TEXT, nextGenDate DATE, modulus INTEGER, addIncomeTo INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, endDate DATE, generateNow CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N')

statements.name: RecurringTransfer
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE RecurringTransfer(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, fromAccount INTEGER, toAccount INTEGER, amount REAL DEFAULT 0.00, timesAYear INTEGER, nextGenDate DATE, modulus INTEGER, notes TEXT, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, endDate DATE, generateNow CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N')

statements.name: Settings
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Settings (cyclestart INTEGER, lastRun DATETIME, currency TEXT, initialBudget REAL, email TEXT, locale TEXT, dateFormat TEXT, imageResolution INTEGER, deleteExpenseAfter INTEGER, deleteReceiptAfter INTEGER, debugFlag INTEGER, screenMajor INTEGER, screenMinor, screenMini INTEGER, screenMicro INTEGER, passwordOnOff INTEGER, password TEXT, passwordEmail TEXT, future1 TEXT, future2 TEXT, future3 TEXT, future4 TEXT, future5 TEXT, future6 TEXT, future7 TEXT, future8 TEXT, future9 TEXT, future10 TEXT, lastUsedAccount INTEGER DEFAULT 0, colorScheme INTEGER DEFAULT 2, lastUsedPayee INTEGER DEFAULT 0, monthlyCycleStart INTEGER DEFAULT 1, rolloverStart TEXT DEFAULT '', showBillReminders CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', showBillBadge CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', startPage INTEGER DEFAULT 0, includeFutureTrans CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', showMonthlyBudgetView CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', keyBoardClicks CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', billLookForward INTEGER DEFAULT 6, billNotifyHour INTEGER DEFAULT 2, showAmountInNumbers CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', importMatchLength INTEGER DEFAULT 16, homeScreenStyle INTEGER DEFAULT 1)

statements.name: SubCategory
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE SubCategory (key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, catKey INTEGER, name TEXT, icon TEXT, deleteOK CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'Y', amount REAL DEFAULT 0.00, forPeriod INTEGER DEFAULT 1, autoGenExpEntry CHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', autoGenDay INTEGER DEFAULT 1, recurExpAmount TEXT, nextGenDate DATE, timesAYear INTEGER, modulus INTEGER, payFrom INTEGER DEFAULT 0, expenseType INTEGER DEFAULT 1, seqNum INTEGER DEFAULT 0, payee INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER)

statements.name: SyncInfo
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE SyncInfo (inAGroup CHAR(1), groupName TEXT, password TEXT, passwordEmail TEXT, lastUpdateSeq INTEGER, enforceRestrictions CHAR(1), lastSync DATETIME)

statements.name: SyncUpdate
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE SyncUpdate(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, updateType TEXT, uuid TEXT, payload TEXT)

statements.name: Transfer
statements.sql: CREATE TABLE Transfer(key INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, transferDate DATE, fromAccount INTEGER, toAccount INTEGER, amount REAL DEFAULT 0.00, notes TEXT, billKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0, deviceIdKey INTEGER, deviceKey INTEGER, currency TEXT, currencyAmount TEXT, recurringKey INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
